alert.note: Alert for Central Oahu; East Honolulu; Ewa Plain; Honolulu Metro; Koolau Leeward; Koolau Windward; Olomana; Waianae Coast; Waianae Mountains (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 1:48AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...Strong and gusty winds will impact portions of Oahu through 300 AM HST... At 146 AM HST, Doppler radar was tracking heavy showers moving over Oahu, moving northeast at 35 mph. Winds have recently gusted to near 50 mph at Honolulu Airport, and other areas in southern Oahu, with these showers. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Honolulu, Waimanalo, Hawaii Kai, Ahuimanu, Kapolei, Waikele, Kalihi, Waiahole, Moanalua, Pearl City, Waipahu, Kaneohe Marine Base, Palolo, Kahaluu, Salt Lake, Kailua, Manoa, Maunawili, Kaneohe and Kunia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
